resources.string: EBA web radio is a Non-denominational Gospel radio with a passion and a mission to broadcast Hope. We are addressing the issues of individuals, youth, women, families, and communities and build trusted relationships with our audience. We are addressing different social issues and assisting communities through social actions such as education, health care, disaster relief, spiritual and economic development. We are sharing Godâ€™s love in remote areas as well as in urban and most advanced cities in order to bridge the gaps among different communities. Our programs are on air through FM and Internet in the heart languages of our audience. We are trying to reach the unreached or least reached areas with the unchanging Word of God through our broadcasts.
